20020001.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파에 가고 싶은데, 어디 있는지 알아요?
20020001.English_Text: I'm trying to find the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>. Do you know where they are?
20020001.Chinese_Text: 我想去<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派，你知道在哪里吗？

20020002.Original_Text: 그건 왜 묻는 거요? 듣자하니... 반달호수에서 무술대회를 망친 난동꾼들이 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 찾고 있다던데 댁들이구만?
20020002.English_Text: Why do you want to know? From what I've heard, the thugs who ruined the Martial Arts Championship at Sapphire Basin have been looking for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>, too. You're not one of them, are you?
20020002.Chinese_Text:
为什么问这个？
听说…在半月湖毁掉武术大会的捣乱者们正在寻找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派，看来就是你们？

20020004.Original_Text: 됐수다! 저리들 가쇼! 에잉~ 가뜩이나 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>도 부족해서 속 시끄러운데, 어디서 시정잡배까지 나타나서는...
20020004.English_Text:
Enough! Get out of here!
Things are hard enough as it is, with the shortage of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>... And now we have to deal with these ruffians, too...
20020004.Chinese_Text:
够了！赶紧走！
唉~缺少<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛丝</>就够恼人了，竟然还有市井流氓过来添乱…

20020005.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파가 어디 있냐구요? 글쎄요.. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파는 원래부터 비밀리에 활동하던 조직이라서요. 정확한 위치를 아는 건 아무도 없을걸요?
20020005.English_Text:
Where are the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>? I'm not so sure...
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> are a secretive organization, after all. I doubt anyone really knows their location.
20020005.Chinese_Text:
你问<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派在哪里？怎么说呢…<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派原本就是一个很隐秘的组织。
我想没有人知道准确的位置。

20020006.English_Text: But I thought they were pretty close with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
20020006.Chinese_Text: 但也有一阵子和<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>的关系很近吧？

20020007.Original_Text: 그랬죠. 해월 대륙을 개척할 당시에는 우리 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 탐사대와 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파는 긴밀하게 협조했었습니다.
20020007.English_Text: They used to be. When we were first pioneering Haewol, we <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> worked closely together.
20020007.Chinese_Text: 没错。开拓海越大陆时，我们<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>探查队与<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派确实进行过紧密合作。

20020008.Original_Text: 하지만 지금은 몇몇 사건으로 사이가 틀어져서 각자의 노선을 타고 있어요.
20020008.English_Text: But due to some incidents, we've grown more distant, and now we walk our own paths.
20020008.Chinese_Text: 但经过几个事件之后，我们已经分道扬镳。

20020010.English_Text: But why are you looking for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>?
20020010.Chinese_Text: 不过你们找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派所为何事？

20020011.English_Text: J-just out of curiosity. Thank you!

20020013.English_Text: I'd like a roll of tough silk.

20020014.Original_Text: 이런.. 질긴 비단이라면 마침 똑 떨어져서요. \n이 ‘평범한 비단’은 어떠십니까?
20020014.English_Text:
Oh, I'm sorry, but we just ran out of tough silk...
How about this common silk?
20020014.Chinese_Text: 哎呀…坚韧的丝绸现在正好缺货。“普通的丝绸”可以吗？

20020015.English_Text: If it's not tough silk, I'm not interested.

20020016.English_Text: The thing is, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</> have been very hard to come by lately.
20020016.Chinese_Text: 但是最近想要<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛丝</>比登天还难。

20020017.Original_Text: 그거야 제 알바 아니죠. \n없으면 그냥 갈래요. 다음에 올게요.
20020017.English_Text:
That's none of my concern.
If you don't have any, then I'll take my leave. See you next time.
20020017.Chinese_Text: 我可不管那么多。既然你们没有货，那我下次再来。

20020018.Original_Text: 에레다? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 찾고 있다는 녀석들이 너희들이야?
20020018.English_Text: Wait, aren't you the ones who've been looking for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>?
20020018.Chinese_Text: 艾瑞达？寻找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派的就是你们？

20020020.Original_Text: 에비, 저리들 가라, 가! 너희들하고 괜히 얽혔다가는 나만 곤란해질라.
20020020.English_Text: Scram, get out of here! Nothing good can come out of mingling with your kind.
20020020.Chinese_Text: 哼，给我离开这里，走开！如果跟你们牵扯在一起，连我也会有麻烦。

20020022.English_Text: Didn't you hear me? Go away!

20020023.Original_Text: 아무래도 정보를 쉽게 구할 수 있을 것 같진 않아.
20020023.English_Text: Hm... It's going to be difficult to gather information.
20020023.Chinese_Text: 看来我们没有办法轻松获取情报。

20020024.English_Text: How about we bring him <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>?

20020025.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>? 아하! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>을 가져다주면서 물어보자는 거지? 좋은 생각인데?
20020025.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spider webs</>? A-ha! You want to bring him some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</> and ask for information in return? Good idea!
20020025.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛丝</>？原来如此！用<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛丝</>换取情报？真是个好主意！

20020026.Original_Text: 좋았어! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거미줄</>은 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>거미 숲 길</>에서 구할 수 있을 거야. 어서 가보자!
20020026.English_Text: All right! We should be able to find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</> at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Cobweb Forest Trail</>. Let's go!
20020026.Chinese_Text: 很好！我们应该可以在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>蜘蛛林道</>获取<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛丝</>，这就出发吧！

20020027.English_Text: Where did you get these <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>? Hmm, what do you want?
20020027.Chinese_Text: 你们竟然有<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蜘蛛丝</>？嘿嘿，你们想要什么？

20020028.Original_Text: 알잖아요. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 가려면 어떻게 해야 해요?
20020028.English_Text: I think you already know the answer to that. Where do I find the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>?
20020028.Chinese_Text: 你也知道，我们想要找到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派。

20020029.Original_Text: 그건... 알겠수다. 대신 나중에 후회해도 원망하지 마쇼.
20020029.English_Text: That's... Ugh, fine then, I'll tell you. But don't blame me if something bad happens.
20020029.Chinese_Text: 这…好吧。不过你们到时候可不要后悔。

20020031.Original_Text: ... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 찾고 싶으면 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>동부생태 조사림</>으로 가보쇼. 그럼 그들이 찾아올거외다.
20020031.English_Text:
...If you want to find the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>, go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>East Ecological Research Site</>.
They'll be there.
20020031.Chinese_Text:
…若想找到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派，去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>东部生态调查林</>吧。
他们会来找你们。

20020034.English_Text: You said you needed <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>, right?

20020036.Original_Text: 아아, 공짜로는 안되죠. \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파를 가고 싶은데... 어떻게 해야해요?
20020036.English_Text:
I won't just give them away for free.
I want to go to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>. How do I find them?
20020036.Chinese_Text:
哎呀，当然不能免费送给你。
我们想要找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派…可以告诉我们吗？

20020037.English_Text: Hmm... Ah, fine. I'll tell you.

20020039.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>동부생태 조사림</>을 가보면 만날 수 있을 거다. \n단, 위험해도 난 모른다?
20020039.English_Text: You'll find the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>East Ecological Research Site</>. But, I won't take any responsibility for what dangers you might run into there.
20020039.Chinese_Text: 只要去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>东部生态调查林</>就能找到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派。不过，遇到危险可不要怪我？

20020040.Original_Text: 그건 우리가 알아서 할 테니 걱정마세요. 고맙습니다!
20020040.English_Text: Don't worry, we can take care of ourselves. Thank you!
20020040.Chinese_Text: 我们自有分寸，请不要担心。谢谢！

20020041.English_Text: Oh... I was not expecting to meet you here.
20020041.Chinese_Text: 这…真是意料之外的邂逅。

20020043.Original_Text: 도대체 이게 어찌 된 일이십니까? \n저희 문주님을 공격한 걸로도 부족해 이젠 저희 문파를 정탐하십니까?
20020043.English_Text:
What's the meaning of this?
Wasn't attacking our leader enough? Are you trying to spy on our clan now, too?
20020043.Chinese_Text:
这到底是怎么回事？
你们不仅攻击我们的门主，还敢来刺探门派？

20020045.Original_Text: 저희 문파는 왜 조사하고 다니신 겁니까?
20020045.English_Text: Why have you been asking around about us?
20020045.Chinese_Text: 你们为什么要调查艾瑞达门派？

20020046.Original_Text: 그거야 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>에레다 문주</>만이 해 줄 수 있는 일이 있거든.
20020046.English_Text: Because there's something we need that only the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>leader of the Edeta</> can perform.
20020046.Chinese_Text: 这是因为有一件事只能拜托艾瑞达门主。

20020049.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>님이요!?? 하아... 애들 장난도 아니고 도대체 왜 이러십니까... \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>님은 신수이십니다. 만나고 싶다고 만날 수 있는 분이 아니라구요.
20020049.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</>? If this is a joke, it isn't funny... 
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</> is an Advocate. You can't meet her just because you want to.
20020049.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>破邪</>大人？？！唉…你们知道自己在说什么吗…
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>破邪</>大人是神兽，不是想见就能见到的。

20020050.Original_Text: 하지만 방법은 있잖아? 대대로 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파는 자신의 신수인 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>에게 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제</>를 올려 계시를 받는 다는 걸 알고 있다구.
20020050.English_Text:
But there is a way, right?
I'm aware of the fact that the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> conducts <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>rituals</> to receive revelations from their Advocate, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</>.
20020050.Chinese_Text: 但你们不是有办法吗？我们知道<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派代代都为神兽<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>破邪</>举行<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>祭祀</>以获得启示。

20020051.Original_Text: 그건... 그래봤자 소용 없습니다. 어차피 제는 문주님만이 행할 수 있고, \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>하름</>님이시라면 현재 칩거중으로 아무와도 만나지 않고 계십니다.
20020051.English_Text:
That... That's not possible.
The ritual can only be conducted by our leader. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</> is currently in self-isolation and refuses to meet with anyone.
20020051.Chinese_Text: 那个…你那么说也没用。反正只有门主大人可以进行祭祀。而霞凛大人目前正在隐居，不见任何人。

20020052.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>? <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</> is still the leader? I thought she ran away.

20020054.English_Text: Do you not know who <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</> really is?
20020054.Chinese_Text: 你们还不知道<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>霞凛</>的真面目？

20020055.English_Text: I don't understand what you're implying.

20020056.Original_Text: 음... 그렇단 말이지... 좋아! 그럼 문주의 정체는 우리가 밝혀줄게. \n대신 넌 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>를 만나게 해줘. 알았지?
20020056.English_Text:
Hmm... Really? All right! Listen, we'll fill you in on Harum's true identity.
But in return, you'll help us meet <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</>. Deal?
20020056.Chinese_Text:
唔…原来如此…很好！我们来揭开门主的真面目。
不过你要让我们与<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>破邪</>见面，明白吗？

20020057.Original_Text: 그러니까 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제</>라는 건 그냥 올릴 수 있는 게 아니라...
20020057.English_Text: I'm telling you, we can't just hold the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</> like that...
20020057.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>祭祀</>可不是随随便便就能举行的…

20020058.Original_Text: 알았어, 알았어. 그럼 준비가 다 되면 다시 보자구!
20020058.English_Text: Fine, fine. Then, we meet again when it's ready!
20020058.Chinese_Text: 知道，知道了。等我们准备好之后再见面吧！

20020059.Original_Text: 그럼 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제</>를 올릴 재료 준비를 하면 되는 거지? \n근데 재료가 뭐야?
20020059.English_Text: So, we just need to prepare the materials for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</>, right? But what do we need?
20020059.Chinese_Text: 我们只要准备好<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>祭祀</>材料就可以吧？不过需要什么材料？

20020061.Original_Text: 이런, 그것부터 알아봐야 하는 구나. 아마 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제</>에 관련된 거라면 영교원의 바롱들이 알고 있을 거야. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>풍요 우림 조사 거점</>에 가 보자.
20020061.English_Text:
Uh oh... so we need to find that out first. I'm sure the Barons of Soul Bridge know something about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</>.
Let's go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Opulent Forest Base</>.
20020061.Chinese_Text: 切，看来需要先了解一下材料。我想灵交院的巴隆们应该会知道有关<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>祭祀</>的事情。去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>丰饶雨林调查据点</>看看吧。

20020063.English_Text: Meowww! You scared me! What is it?
20020063.Chinese_Text: 吓死了喵！！有什么事吗喵？

20020064.Original_Text: 영교원은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신수를 부르는 제사</>에 대해서 알고 있지?
20020064.English_Text: Soul Bridge knows about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual to call the Advocate</>, right?
20020064.Chinese_Text: 灵交院知道有关召唤神兽的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>祭祀</>的事情吧？

20020065.Original_Text: 흐음~ 그거야 알고 있다냥. 대대로 기록으로 전해 내려오고 있다냥! \n근데... 그걸 네가 어찌 아냥?
20020065.English_Text:
Of course I know about it. The method's been passed down fur generations!
But... how do you know about it, mrrow?
20020065.Chinese_Text:
唔~当然喵。我们有代代相传的记录资料喵！
不过…你怎么会知道这件事喵？

20020066.English_Text: Because I've had one done for me before.

20020067.English_Text: Meow? You had a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</> done for you?

20020068.Original_Text: 아, 그게 아니라 암튼, 그래서 재료가 뭐야?
20020068.English_Text: Uh, forget what I said. Anyway, what are the necessary materials?
20020068.Chinese_Text: 啊，我不是这个意思。总之，祭祀需要什么材料？

20020069.English_Text: Hmm... your attitude is fur-ustrating. I don't wanna tell you, hiss!
20020069.Chinese_Text: 唔…真是讨厌喵。我不想告诉你喵！

20020071.Original_Text: 맨입으로는 가르쳐주지 않겠다냥! \n게다가 반말하는 인간은 더 싫다냥!
20020071.English_Text: Well now I won't tell it to you for free! I don't like vewy rude people, hiss!
20020071.Chinese_Text: 我不会白白告诉你喵！而且我更讨厌说话不讲礼貌的人类喵！

20020073.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>을 말리며 무엇을 가져다 주면 되겠냐고 묻는다)
20020073.English_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>, wait a sec. What do you want?
20020073.Chinese_Text: （赶紧阻止<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>饿狼</>，问巴隆需要什么）

20020074.Original_Text: 넌 말이 좀 통하는구냥. 그럼 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>을 가져다 달라냥. \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>을 가져다 주면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>제사</>에 대해서 알려주겠다냥.
20020074.English_Text: Seems like you're the more a-purr-oachable one! Here's the deal, meow. If you bring me <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>, I'll tell you about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</>.
20020074.Chinese_Text:
你这个人比较好说话喵。那就给我带来一些<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>猕猴桃草</>喵。
只要带来<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>猕猴桃草</>，我就会告诉你们有关<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>祭祀</>的事情喵。

20020075.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>? Where am I supposed to get a weed like that?
20020075.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>猕猴桃草</>？在哪里可以找到那种奇怪的草？

20020076.English_Text: What do you mean by weed!?

20020077.Original_Text: (이번엔 바롱을 진정시키며 어디서 구할 수 있는지 다시 묻는다)
20020077.English_Text: I'm sure he didn't mean that. Where can they be found?
20020077.Chinese_Text: （让巴隆冷静下来，问到底可以在哪里找到）

20020078.Original_Text: 흠흠. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>은 도화상전에 가면 구할 수 있을 거다냥. \n그럼 기다리고 있겠다냥.
20020078.English_Text:
Hmph. You can get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</> from the Peach Blossom.
Well, I'll be waiting right here fur you, meow.
20020078.Chinese_Text: 哼。在桃花商廛可以买到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>猕猴桃草</>喵。我会在这里等着你喵。

20020079.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>이요? \n허허, 바롱들이 자주 찾아서 종종 들여오곤 했었는데.
20020079.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>?
Haha, we usually get shipments pretty often because the Barons are quite fond of it.
20020079.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>猕猴桃草</>？哈哈，巴隆们经常来买猕猴桃草，所以我们偶尔也会进货。

20020080.English_Text: Really!? So how much is it!?

20020081.Original_Text: 말은 끝까지 들어보셔야죠. \n종종 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>을 들여오긴 했지만 이번엔 풍랑 탓에 들여오지 못했습니다.
20020081.English_Text:
Well... things are a bit different nowadays.
We weren't able to get any <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</> recently because of the storm.
20020081.Chinese_Text:
请听我把话说完。
我们虽然会进货，但这次遇到风浪，因此没有收到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>猕猴桃草</>。

20020083.Original_Text: 네, 그렇죠. 제가 지금 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>개다래풀</>이 없다는 말이죠. 하하하.
20020083.English_Text: Yes, that's right. We have no <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Silvervine grass</>. Heh.
20020083.Chinese_Text: 没错。商廛里没有<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>猕猴桃草</>。哈哈哈。

20020084.Original_Text: 아... 그렇게까지 실망하실 거까지는... 거참... 좋습니다. 제가 쟁여놓은 게 딱 하나 남았는데 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>녹각다귀의 뿔</>을 좀 구해다 주시면 드리겠습니다.
20020084.English_Text:
Ah... I didn't think you'd be so disappointed... Ah, fine.
I have a little that I've been stashing for an emergency. I'll trade it for some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Greenhorn’s Horns</>.
20020084.Chinese_Text:
唉…没想到客人会如此失望…真是…好吧。
我给自己留有一份猕猴桃草，客人可以用<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>绿角大鬼的角</>来换。

20020085.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>녹각다귀의 뿔</>! 좋아요, 그거 어디서 구할 수 있어요!?
20020085.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Greenhorn’s Horns</>! Okay, where can I get those?
20020085.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>绿角大鬼的角</>！好，在哪里可以找到绿角大鬼？！

20020086.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>녹색 뿔의 숲</>에 가보시면 발에 차이는 게 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</> 일 겁니다.

20020087.English_Text: All right. Hang tight, I'll be right back!
20020087.Chinese_Text: 知道了。我很快就回来，你等着！

20020090.Original_Text: 아차차, 미안하다냥. 내가 잠시 정신을 놓았다냥. 약속은 지키겠다냥.
20020090.English_Text: Oops, sowwy... I got a little distracted. I'll keep my promise, meow.
20020090.Chinese_Text: 哎呀，对不起喵。我有些忘乎所以喵。我会信守承诺喵。

20020091.Original_Text: 일단, 신수를 부르는 “<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>”는 길을 부르는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>방울</>, 길을 비추는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거울</> 그리고 길을 만드는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검</>! 이렇게 세가지 재료가 필요하다냥.
20020091.English_Text: For the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</> to call an Advocate, you need a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell</> that calls the path, a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mirror</> that reflects the path, and a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>blade</> that makes the path!
20020091.Chinese_Text: 首先，召唤神兽的“<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神祭礼</>”需要召唤道路的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>铃铛</>、照耀道路的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>镜子</>，还有创造道路的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>宝剑</>！这三种材料喵。

20020092.Original_Text: 각 재료는 우리 영교원을 제외한 나머지 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>들이 가지고 있다냥.
20020092.English_Text: Each object is kept by the other factions of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>, excluding the Soul Bridge.
20020092.Chinese_Text: 灵交院之外的其他<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>四虎</>分别拥有这些材料喵。

20020093.Original_Text: 흐음.. 그럼 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</>들을 찾아가서 받으면 되는 거야?
20020093.English_Text: Hmm... So I need to visit each of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sahos</> and get them?
20020093.Chinese_Text: 唔…也就是说需要去找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>四虎</>索要材料？

20020094.Original_Text: 그게 끝이 아니다냥. 신수를 부르는 일은 그만큼 중요한 일이라 나라의 허가를 받아야 한다냥.
20020094.English_Text: That's not all, meow. Calling an Advocate is an important matter! You need to receive purrmission from a political authority.
20020094.Chinese_Text: 这样还不算完喵。召唤神兽可是非常重要的事情，需要得到国家的许可喵。

20020095.Original_Text: 에에? 지금 나보고 풍제국이라도 갔다오라는 거야?
20020095.English_Text: What? Are you saying I need to go all the way to the Empire?
20020095.Chinese_Text: 咦？难道我还要去一趟风帝国？

20020096.Original_Text: 으이고 바보다냥. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이 있지 않냥. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이 국가의 권한을 위임받아 수행하고 있다냥. 그러니 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에게 허락을 구하면 된다냥.
20020096.English_Text:
Ugh, how dense are you, hiss? The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>! They repurrsent the Empire in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>, so they have that authority.
You just need to get the go-ahead from the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>, mrrow.
20020096.Chinese_Text: 真是愚蠢喵。这里不是有<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>吗喵。<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海越大陆</>的活动得到了国家的委任。也就是说，只要获得<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>的许可就行喵。

20020097.Original_Text: 뭐야, 결국 재료랑 허락도 우리가 받아내야 한다는 거잖아.
20020097.English_Text: So, we need to go find those objects and get that permission.
20020097.Chinese_Text: 什么，我们不仅需要找到材料，还要去获得许可？

20020098.Original_Text: 뭐... 암튼 난 약속은 지켰다냥. 그럼 행운을 빈다냥!
20020098.English_Text: Well... I kept my end of the bargain. Then, I wish you the best of luck, purr!
20020098.Chinese_Text: 唔…总之我兑现了自己的承诺喵。那就祝你好运喵！

20020099.Original_Text: 그럼 본격적으로 재료를 구해볼까? 나 없어도 잘 할 수 있지?
20020099.English_Text: Then, shall we get started with getting a hold of the objects? You can do it without me, right?
20020099.Chinese_Text: 这就去找材料如何？你一个人没问题吧？

20020101.Original_Text: 하하, 그래. 재료를 다 구하면 거점에서 만나.
20020101.English_Text: Haha, all right. Once you've gathered everything, meet me back at the base.
20020101.Chinese_Text: 哈哈，很好。找齐材料之后在据点碰头吧。

20020102.English_Text: (He's not willing to talk to me yet.)

20020103.English_Text: (I'd better find a way to earn his trust.)

20020104.Original_Text: 거점 북쪽의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>녹각다귀</>들이 소란을 일으키고 있어 고민입니다. \n예전 같으면 협력 문파들이 나서서 도와줬을 텐데... 요즘은 사이가 좋지 못해 그들에게 도움을 청하기도 힘이 드네요.
20020104.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</> north of the base have been causing trouble lately.
The allied clans would have helped us out in the past... But things between us have soured, so it's not easy to ask them for a favor.
20020104.Chinese_Text: 据点北边的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿角大鬼</>给我们造成了很多麻烦。如果是过去，联合门派会出手相助…但最近关系不好，无法开口请求帮助。

20020105.English_Text: Why has the relationship gotten worse?

20020106.Original_Text: 예전에 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이 협력 문파들의 신뢰를 잃는 일이 있었다고 합니다.  \n아마도 윗선에서 무슨 일이 있었던 듯 한데... 정작 곤란한 건 밑에 있는 우리들이니...
20020106.English_Text:
I heard that the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> did something that made the other clans lose their trust in them.
It seems like something happened between the leaders... But everyone else working under them is suffering...
20020106.Chinese_Text: 听说<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>在过去对联合门派做了一些不得人心的事情。不知道上头做了什么…最后受累的却是我们…

20020107.English_Text: I can help out with the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Greenhorns</>.
20020107.Chinese_Text: （表示可以帮忙消灭<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>绿角大鬼</>）

20020108.English_Text: Really? I don't know how I can repay you... Thank you!
20020108.Chinese_Text: 真的吗？太好了…真是非常感谢！

20020110.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>버려진 감시탑</>에서 물자를 옮기는 중인데... 일손이 너무 부족해서요.
20020110.English_Text: We're moving supplies from the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Abandoned Watchtower</>, but we really don't have enough workers.
20020110.Chinese_Text: 我们在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>被遗弃的监视塔</>搬运物资…但是人手有些不足。

20020112.Original_Text: 본래는 협력 문파원들이 남아있기로 했었는데 어찌된 일인지 그들이 감시탑을 비워버려서요. \n그 뒤로 저희가 감시탑에 남아 있는 물자를 꾸준히 옮기고는 있는데... 저희들만으로는 힘이 드네요.
20020112.English_Text:
The allied clans were supposed to stay there, but for some reason, they left.
Since then, we've been diligently moving the supplies there... But it hasn't been easy with so few people to do the work.
20020112.Chinese_Text: 联合门派成员们本来应该留守在监视塔，但不知道为什么他们离开了监视塔。之后我们开始搬走监视塔内的剩余物资…但只靠我们很辛苦。

20020115.Original_Text: 대장님과 만나고 싶다고? 갑자기 나타나서는 무슨 뚱딴지 같은 소리야.
20020115.English_Text: You want to meet our leader? And who exactly are you?
20020115.Chinese_Text: 想见队长？突然说什么胡话。

20020117.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>허가증</>이 뭔지는 모르겠고. 너 같이 뭐도 아닌 사람을 우리 대장님이 왜 만나겠어. 썩 저리가!
20020117.English_Text:
I don't care about this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</> of yours. Why would the leader meet a nobody like you?
Get lost!
20020117.Chinese_Text:
我可不管什么<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>许可证</>。我们的队长怎么可能愿意见你这种无名之辈。
快走开！

20020118.Original_Text: 흠흠, 뭐 이런 걸 받아서 대장님께 말씀 드리는 건 아닐세. \n자네가 워낙 뛰어난 인재같아 보여서 말이지. 크흠흠.
20020118.English_Text:
Hmm, don't get me wrong. I'm not telling the leader about you just because of this present.
I simply got the impression that you must be an outstanding person. Hmph!
20020118.Chinese_Text:
呵呵，我不是因为收到这种东西才会报告队长。
而是因为你看起来是个优秀的人才。呵呵呵。

20020119.Original_Text: 듣자하니, 자네가 우리 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>을 많이 도왔다고 하더군. \n아무 이유없이 그런 행동을 하진 않았을테고... 무얼 원하는 거지?
20020119.English_Text:
From what I've heard, you have helped us <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> out quite a bit.
I doubt that you did it just out of the goodness of your heart... So, what do you want from us?
20020119.Chinese_Text:
听说你帮我们<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>做了很多事情。
应该有什么理由吧…你想要什么？

20020120.English_Text: I need a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</> to conduct the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>.
20020120.Chinese_Text: （说为了举行<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神祭礼</>，需要得到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>许可证</>）

20020121.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>? 신수를 부르겠다? 하! 그 당돌함만은 세계 제일이라 칭할 수 있겠구나.\n허나, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>의 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>허가증</>을 얻기 위해서는 자격증명이 필요하네. 해당 시련을 자네가 통과할 수 있을까?
20020121.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>? You want to call an Advocate? Hah! You're pretty daring, I'll give you that.
But, to receive a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</> for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>, you'll have to prove yourself. Do you think you can make it through the trial?
20020121.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神祭礼</>？你想召唤神兽？哈！真是胆大包天。不过，你需要证明自己的资格才能获得<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神祭礼</>的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>许可证</>。你能通过试炼吗？

20020123.English_Text: All right. Let's see if you truly have the skills.
20020123.Chinese_Text: 很好。让我看看你的实力吧。

20020124.Original_Text: 흠. 제법 근성이 있는 자로구나. \n좋다. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>허가증</>을 내어주도록 하지. 여기 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>허가증</>일세.
20020124.English_Text:
Hmm, you're not bad at all.
Fine. I will grant you the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</>. Here, take it.
20020124.Chinese_Text:
嗯，看来你确实很有毅力。
很好。我可以给你<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>许可证</>，<textColor=[255:204:102:255]></>拿走吧。

20020126.Original_Text: 자네가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>를 불러낼 수 있을지는 모르겠네만, \n행여라도 그들을 만나게 되면 이것 하나만 물어봐 주겠나?
20020126.English_Text:
I don't know if you will really call an <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Advocate</>,
but if you do, can you ask them this one question?
20020126.Chinese_Text:
虽然不知道你能不能召唤出神兽，
但如果成功，可以帮我问一件事吗？

20020128.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>불마</>가 세상을 이리 어지럽히고 있건만, 부정한 존재를 멸하는 것이 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>의 도리임에도 불구하고 어찌하여 모습을 드러내지 않는 것인지 말이네.
20020128.English_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hollows</> are wreaking so much havoc upon this world. Even though it is the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Advocates</>' duty to get rid of such impure beings, they refuse to show themselves. Why is that?
20020128.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>不磨</>者正在侵扰这个世界，而神兽有义务消灭这些不净的东西，可为何至今都不现身？

20020130.English_Text: Here, take this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>permit</>. Good luck with the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ritual</>.
20020130.Chinese_Text: 好了，拿好<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>许可证</>，希望<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>祭礼</>能顺利进行。

20020131.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>! 또 뵙는군요. \n이번엔 또 무슨 행사를 망쳐놓으셨습니까?
20020131.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>! We meet again.
What event did you ruin this time?
20020131.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>！又见面了。
这次又毁掉了什么大型活动呢？

20020133.English_Text: I'm kidding. What brings you here?
20020133.Chinese_Text: 开个玩笑而已。有什么事吗？

20020134.English_Text: I'm looking for a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell that calls the path</>.
20020134.Chinese_Text: （表示想要获得召唤道路的铃铛）

20020135.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>길을 부르는 방울</>이라면... <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>매화령</>을 말씀하시는 것 같군요. \n이유를 여쭤도 되겠습니까?
20020135.English_Text:
A <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>bell that calls the path</>... Do you mean the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plum Blossom Bell</>?
May I ask why you're looking for such a thing?
20020135.Chinese_Text:
召唤道路的铃铛…看来是在说<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>梅花铃</>。
可以问为什么吗？

20020136.English_Text: I wish to conduct the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>.

20020137.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>님을 부른다는 말씀입니까? 정말이지... 소협은 매번 저를 놀라게 하시는군요. \n흐음... 좋습니다. 허나...
20020137.English_Text:
You really plan to call upon an <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Advocate</>? You two are just full of surprises.
That's all fine and dandy, but...
20020137.Chinese_Text: 想要召唤神兽吗？真是…少侠每次都有惊人之举呢。嗯…好吧。我也对神兽降临感兴趣，因此可以借给你。不过…

20020139.Original_Text: 저희 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신입 단원</>이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>에게 잡혀있다고 합니다. \n이 문제를 해결해주시면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>매화령</>을 빌려드리지요.
20020139.English_Text:
Our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>recruit</> is being held captive by the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>.
I'll lend you the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plum Blossom Bell</> if you can get him back.
20020139.Chinese_Text: 很可惜的是，搬运<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>梅花铃</>的新手团员被<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>赤匪派</>抓走了。所以若想借<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>梅花铃</>，最好先去找那个团员。

20020140.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>이 나서면 충분히 구할 수 있지 않으냐고 묻는다)
20020140.English_Text: Can the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom</> get it themselves?
20020140.Chinese_Text: （问<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>梅花铃</>是珍贵物品，为何会让新手去搬运）

20020141.Original_Text: 저희가 나설 수도 있으나 마침 소협이 오셨으니 손을 빌리려고 하는 거지요. \n소협의 실력이야 제가 잘 알고 있으니까요. 그럼 부탁드립니다.
20020141.English_Text:
We could handle this ourselves... but we're asking for your help since you're here anyway.
We've all heard about how skilled you are. I'll leave the job to you.
20020141.Chinese_Text: 是呀，怎么会变成这样…所以才会发生被绑架这种事吧？都是我的错。不过既然事已至此，这件事就拜托你了。去峡谷风路就能听到新手团员的行踪。

20020142.English_Text: You've come. I've heard about what you wanted from my leader.
20020142.Chinese_Text: 欢迎少侠。团主大人已经告诉我们了。

20020144.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>와 자주 충돌이 있었지만 그저 시비정도에 불과했습니다. \n그런데 이번에 저희 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신입</>이 납치를 당하는 일이 발생했습니다.
20020144.English_Text:
We've had several clashes with the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>, but it was never anything serious.
But this time, they kidnapped our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>recruit</>.
20020144.Chinese_Text:
我们虽然经常与<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>赤匪派</>发生摩擦，但都只是小矛盾。
不过这次发生了新手团员被绑架的事情，我们也不能坐视不管…

20020145.Chinese_Text: （表示想要知道新手团员的位置）

20020146.Original_Text: 정확한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신입</>의 위치는 숲에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>정예단원</>을 만나 물어보시면 될 것 같습니다.
20020146.English_Text: You can ask our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Elite member</> in the forest about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>recruit</>'s exact location.
20020146.Chinese_Text: 他应该在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>赤匪森林</>深处。路上有我们的团员设置的标记，边走边回收标记就能见到。

20020147.Original_Text: 어서 오십시오. 기다리고 있었습니다. \n바로 말씀드리면 저희 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신입</>은 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>혈비패 기지 안쪽</>에 잡혀있습니다. 그럼 부탁드리겠습니다!
20020147.English_Text:
Welcome. I've been waiting for you.
I'll cut to the chase. Our <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>recruit</> is being held <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>inside the Scarlet Masks' base</>. Please save our recruit!
20020147.Chinese_Text:
欢迎，我们已经恭候多时。
直入主题吧。我们的新手团员就被关在那里的监狱。请你去救他！

20020149.Original_Text: 제가 나서면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>와 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>의 문제로 일이 번질 수 있습니다.
20020149.English_Text: This could become a problem between the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Plum Blossom</> if I interfere.
20020149.Chinese_Text: 啊…我们是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花团</>成员。若我们帮了少侠，事情就会从一个人的问题上升为整个<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>梅花团</>的问题。因此…

20020150.English_Text: Does that mean that I have to do it alone?
20020150.Chinese_Text: （问是不是让自己单独解决的意思）

20020151.English_Text: I know it's shameless of me to say this, but yes.
20020151.Chinese_Text: 真是不好意思，那么就拜托了。

20020153.English_Text: Thank you, you're just in time.

20020154.Chinese_Text: （问是否早就知道会有人来救）

20020155.Original_Text: 저희 단원들이 사람이 올 거라고 신호를 보냈습니다. \n흠... 저희 단원들이라면 충분히 저를 구할 수 있었을 텐데... 참 이상합니다.
20020155.English_Text: The members sent me a signal, so I knew someone would be coming to help. It was a little strange... they should be able to save me themselves.
20020155.Chinese_Text: 是的。团主大人说会派人来清理<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>赤匪派</>，因此让我暂时被抓去…难道有什么问题吗？

20020157.English_Text: Do you? Let's get out of here first.
20020157.Chinese_Text:
多谢相助。我们回据点吧。
团主大人说会在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迷雾森林开拓地</>等着我们。

20020158.Chinese_Text: 哈哈，欢迎回来。大家辛苦了。

20020159.English_Text: Was this the plan all along?
20020159.Chinese_Text: （问是否从一开始就有这个打算）

20020160.English_Text: Oh... So you figured it out.

20020161.English_Text: Did you use me to attack the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>?
20020161.Chinese_Text: （问是不是利用自己去教训<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>赤匪派</>）

20020162.Original_Text: 역시 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>님. 그렇습니다. \n근래들어 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>의 횡포가 점차 심해지고 있어 방법을 강구하던 참이었습니다.
20020162.English_Text:
You are the great <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, after all. Yes.
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</> have been getting more violent recently, so we were looking for a way to solve the problem.
20020162.Chinese_Text: 果然瞒不过<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>。没错。原本只是小打小闹的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>赤匪派</>最近越来越蛮横，因此我一直在想办法教训他们。

20020163.Original_Text: 그러나 저희 매화단이 직접 움직이면 자칫 큰 싸움으로 번질 수 있으니 고민하고 있었습니다.
20020163.English_Text: But if we, the Plum Blossom, make a move directly, it might end up becoming a much bigger fight...
20020163.Chinese_Text: 但是梅花团团员直接出手的话，可能会导致全面战争…

20020164.Original_Text: (자신을 이용한 건 불쾌하나, 영리한 방법이었다고 말한다)
20020164.English_Text: I'm pretty shocked I was used like this, but it was a clever scheme.
20020164.Chinese_Text: （表示虽然对于被利用感到不愉快，但确实是个聪明的办法）

20020165.Original_Text: 그렇게 말씀해주시니 감사합니다. \n대신이라고 하긴 뭐하나, 보답으로 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>매화령</>을 빌려드리지요.
20020165.English_Text:
Thank you for the compliment.
I know it's not much of a reward, but here. I will lend you the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Plum Blossom Bell</>.
20020165.Chinese_Text:
多谢你的理解。
作为报答，我会把<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>梅花铃</>借给你。

20020167.English_Text: I wish you the best of luck in meeting an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Advocate</>.
20020167.Chinese_Text:
希望你能成功召唤出神兽。
那么等你来还梅花铃的时候再见吧。

20020168.Original_Text: 오, 이게 누구신가. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></> 아니신가. \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>으로 간다는 이야기는 들었네만, 여기서 보게 될 줄이야.
20020168.English_Text:
Oh, look who we have here. It's <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>.
I heard that you were heading for <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>, but I wasn't expecting to run into you here.
20020168.Chinese_Text:
哟，这不是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>吗，真是稀客。
听说你去了<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海越大陆</>，没想到会在这里见到你。

20020169.Original_Text: 나야 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</> 확장을 위해 대륙을 넘어왔다지만... \n자네는 여긴 어쩐일인가? 게다가 난 왜 찾아왔고?
20020169.English_Text:
I came here to expand the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>,
but what brings you to Haewol? And why did you want to see me?
20020169.Chinese_Text:
我来海越大陆是为了扩张桃花商廛…
你来这里是为了什么？而且为什么会来找我？

20020170.Original_Text: (사정이 있어 넘어왔고, 그를 위해 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>길을 비추는 거울</>이 필요하다 말한다)
20020170.English_Text: I have my own reasons. I need the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mirror that reflects the path</> to accomplish something important.
20020170.Chinese_Text: （表示有苦衷，为此需要照耀道路的镜子）

20020171.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>길을 비추는 거울</>...? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</> 말인가?\n자네, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>를 부를 계획인가 보지?
20020171.English_Text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mirror that reflects the path</>? Do you mean the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</>? Oh, my... You're really trying to call an <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Advocate</>?
20020171.Chinese_Text:
照耀道路的镜子…？你是说<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>桃花镜</>？
哎呀…你想召唤神兽？

20020173.Original_Text: 하하, 반가운 이의 부탁이라면 얼마든지 들어주고야 말고. \n그러나 자네가 알아야 할 게 있네. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</>은 대대로 내려오는 물건이 아니네.
20020173.English_Text:
Haha, since it's you, of course I'll help. But there's something that you must know.
The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</> is not something that's been passed down among us.
20020173.Chinese_Text:
哈哈，老友的请求当然要答应。
不过你需要知道一件事，<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>桃花镜</>并不是代代相传的东西。

20020175.Original_Text: 만들어야 한다는 말일세. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</>은 특별한 토양을 구워 만드는 물건으로, \n한번 사용하면 깨져서 못쓰게 된다네. 필요할때 만들어 한번만 사용하는 물건이란 의미지.
20020175.English_Text:
It means you need to make it. The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</> is made from a special sand, and after using it once, it shatters.
You must make it each time you need to use it.
20020175.Chinese_Text: 意思是需要制作。<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>桃花镜</>需要使用特殊土壤烧制，用过一次之后就会碎掉，无法使用第二次。我们只会在有需要的时候制作。

20020176.Original_Text: 대신 만드는 건 간단해서, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>재료</>만 있으면 우리 상인들이 알아서 해 줄 걸세.
20020176.English_Text: It's pretty simple to craft. As long as we have the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>materials</>, the merchants will take care of the rest.
20020176.Chinese_Text: 不过制作起来很简单，我们的商人只要有材料就能制作。

20020178.Original_Text: 그렇다면야 간단하지. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>재료</>는 어디보자... \n그래, <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>메말라 가는 늪지</>에서도 구할 수 있을걸세.
20020178.English_Text:
That makes things easy. The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>materials</> are...
Let's see, yes, you will be able to find them in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Disappearing Swamp</>.
20020178.Chinese_Text:
那就简单多了。让我想想…
对了，去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>干涸沼泽</>就能找到材料。

20020179.Original_Text: 마침 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</>을 제작할 줄 아는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>공예가</>가 이곳 거점에 있으니 이야기해보게. 미리 얘기해두겠네.
20020179.English_Text: There just happens to be a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>craftsman</> who knows how to craft a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</>, so you should talk to him. I'll send word in advance.
20020179.Chinese_Text:
桃花商廛负责人也正好在那里，你去问他吧。
我会提前告诉他。

20020180.Original_Text: 상전주님께서 보내신 분이시군요. \n어서 오십시오. 구하시는 물건은 제가 만들어 드리겠습니다.
20020180.English_Text:
You must be the one that the Master mentioned.
Welcome. I will make the item you're looking for.
20020180.Chinese_Text:
看来你就是商廛老板派来的人，欢迎。
我会为你制作需要的东西。

20020181.English_Text: I'll leave it up to you.

20020182.Original_Text: 저야말로 잘 부탁드립니다. 재료는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>메말라 가는 늪지</> 가장 안쪽에 있는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검은 모래</>를 가져오시면 됩니다. 가시는 길에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>인면충</>이 있으니 조심하시구요.
20020182.English_Text:
That's what I should say. Please bring me the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>black sands</> from the deepest part of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Disappearing Swamp</>.
There are <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion Mantises</> on the way, so please be careful.
20020182.Chinese_Text: 这句话应该由我来说。材料是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>干涸沼泽</>最深处的黑沙。路上有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>人面虫</>，请小心。

20020184.Original_Text: 휴 살았네요. 다른게 아니라 저희는 이곳에 모래를 채집하러 왔는데...\n글쎄, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>인면충</> 때문에 돌아갈 길이 막혔지 뭡니까. 소협께서 좀 도와주십쇼.
20020184.English_Text:
Phew, you've saved us! We came here to gather the sand,
but the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Illusion Mantises</> are blocking the way back. Please, you've got to help us out.
20020184.Chinese_Text:
呼，得救了。我们来这里想要采一些沙子，
但被<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>人面虫</>挡住了回去的路。请少侠帮帮我们。

20020186.English_Text: Thank you! Thank you so much!

20020187.Original_Text: 무사히 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>재료</>를 가져오셨군요. \n제가 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>다른 재료</>를 준비할 동안 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>모래</>를 손질해 주시면 감사하겠습니다.
20020187.English_Text:
Oh, you've brought the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>materials</>.
While I prepare <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>everything else</>, please process the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>sand</>.
20020187.Chinese_Text:
你平安带回了材料呢。
可以在我准备其他材料的时候，整理一下黑沙吗？

20020188.English_Text: You can find the tools you need over there.

20020189.Original_Text: 자, 여기 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>도화경</>입니다. \n도와주신 덕분에 수월하게 만들 수 있었습니다.
20020189.English_Text: Here's the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Peach Blossom Mirror</>. Thanks to your help, everything went smoothly.
20020189.Chinese_Text: 给，这就是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>桃花镜</>。多亏你的帮忙，工作变得简单多了。

20020191.Original_Text: 별말씀을요. 그럼 하시는 일이 잘 되길 기원합니다.
20020191.English_Text: You're very welcome. I wish you the best of luck for your mission.
20020191.Chinese_Text: 不客气。希望你能达成自己的目标。

20020193.English_Text: Long time no see to you, too!

20020194.Original_Text: 해월대륙은 좀 어때? 동방대륙이랑은 또 다르지? \n혹시 일자리를 찾고 있다면 내가 얼마든지 주선해줄게.
20020194.English_Text: How do you like Haewol so far? It's different from the East, isn't it? If you're looking for a job, I'm happy to introduce you to someone I know.
20020194.Chinese_Text:
在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海越大陆</>过得如何？感觉跟东方大陆很不一样吧？
如果想要找工作的话，我可以帮你介绍一下。

20020195.English_Text: I'm looking for the blade that makes the path.
20020195.Chinese_Text: （表示正在寻找创造道路的宝剑）

20020196.Original_Text: 우리 철문의 보검, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금경철검</>을 말하는 거야? \n뭐... 못 빌려줄 것도 없지.
20020196.English_Text: Are you talking about our treasure, the Soul Steel Blade? Well, sure, we can let you borrow it.
20020196.Chinese_Text:
你说的是哲门的宝剑，<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>金庚哲剑</>。
唔…倒也不是不可以借给你。

20020197.Original_Text: 그런 눈빛으로 본다고 내가 빌려줄... 수 있긴 해. \n하지만 지금은 내가 여력이 안 돼. 나중에 다시 오는 건 어때?
20020197.English_Text:
Even if you look at me like that, I can't—actually, I can let you borrow it,
but not right now. Could you come back later?
20020197.Chinese_Text:
用那种眼神看我的话，更是难以拒绝呢。
不过我现在有些忙，以后再来找我好吗？

20020198.English_Text: It'll be too late by then.

20020199.Original_Text: 흠 그러면 이건 어때? 내가 재료 찾는 일을 도와줘. \n그 일만 마무리 되면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금경철검</>을 빌려줄게.
20020199.English_Text: Hmm... Then, how about this? Help me look for some materials. As soon as that's done, I will lend you the Soul Steel Blade.
20020199.Chinese_Text:
呵呵…那这样可以吗？你帮我搜集材料，
事成之后，我把<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>金庚哲剑</>借给你。

20020201.Original_Text: 말이 잘 통해서 좋네. 그럼 암각다귀의 뿔부터 구해줘. 날카롭고 견고해 재료로 손색이 없지. \n암각다귀는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>골짜기 바람길</>에서 찾을 수 있을 거야.
20020201.English_Text:
It seems we're on the same page, then! All right, then please bring me Darkhorn horns first. Since they're sharp and durable, they make wonderful materials.
You can find Darkhorns in the Windpath Valley.
20020201.Chinese_Text: 跟聪明人打交道真是愉快。那先帮我找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>暗角大鬼的角</>怎么样？这东西锋利，而且坚硬，用作材料再好不过。<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>暗角大鬼</>可以在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>峡谷风路</>找到。

20020202.Original_Text: 다른 재료들은 그 뒤에 하나씩 말해줄게.
20020202.English_Text: I'll tell you the other materials I need afterward, one at a time.
20020202.Chinese_Text: 其他材料我会慢慢告诉你。

20020203.Original_Text: 휘유... 재료가 좀 많았는데 금방 처리했네. 인정!
20020203.English_Text: (Whistling) You did a good job, collecting so many materials so quickly!
20020203.Chinese_Text: 呼…需要的材料相当多的，没想到这么快就找齐了。真不愧是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>。

20020205.Original_Text: 그랬나? 정신없이 일하다 보니 시간 가는 줄 몰랐네. \n자, 여기 약속한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금경철검</>이야.
20020205.English_Text: Wasn't it? I was so busy, I just lost track of the time. Alright, here's the Soul Steel Blade as I promised.
20020205.Chinese_Text:
哈哈，是吗？忙得我都忘记了时间呢。
好，给你约定好的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>金庚哲剑</>。

20020206.Original_Text: 초대 철문주님께서 직접 만드신 보검이니 상처없이 돌려줘야돼!
20020206.English_Text: It's a precious blade made by the first master, so you must return it in perfect condition!
20020206.Chinese_Text: 这是初代哲门主大人亲手打造的宝剑，一定要完好无损地还回来！

20020209.Chinese_Text: 这么快就找齐了所有材料？真厉害！

20020210.English_Text: Long time no see to you, too!

20020211.Original_Text: 재료 준비도 끝났고, 이제 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>하름</>의 정체를 밝혀낼 일만 남았네!
20020211.English_Text: The materials are ready, so now we just have to reveal <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Harum</>'s true identity!
20020211.Chinese_Text: 不要瞪我。我这边也很忙。

20020212.English_Text: I'm ready, so let's go quickly.

20020213.English_Text: Great! Shall we head for the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>secret base</>?
20020213.Chinese_Text:
反正做了些事，等会再给你说。既然材料都集齐了…
接下来只要揭开霞凛的真面目就好了对吧？很好，去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>秘密据点</>吧？

20020215.English_Text: How? That's easy, we just need to... Wait, how did we get there again?

20020216.Original_Text: 이런, 가는 길을 모르네? 그러고 보니 우리 그땐 납치당해서 끌려갔었구나... \n그럼 이제 어떡하지? 어떻게 가지?
20020216.English_Text:
We don't actually know how to get there. After all, last time, we were kidnapped and taken there...
What do we do now? How do we get there?
20020216.Chinese_Text:
哎哟，我们原来不知道路？哦对，上次是被绑架过去的…
那么接下来该怎么办？该怎么去那里？

20020217.English_Text: How about we go to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</> at the Soul Bridge?
20020217.Chinese_Text: （提议去找灵交院的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>噗隆噗隆</>）

20020218.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>? 아! 그들은 한번 갔던 곳은 축지술을 펼칠 수 있으니까? \n그래! 좋은 생각이야. 그런데... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>은 어디 있는데?
20020218.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</>? Ah! Right, he can perform windstride to places we've been before.
Yes! Good idea. But... where is <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</>?
20020218.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>噗隆噗隆</>？对了！他们可以使用遁地术去曾经去过的地方！
很好！真是个好主意。不过…<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>噗隆噗隆</>在哪？

20020219.English_Text: Ah, it's <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>! It's vewy good to see you again, meow!

20020220.English_Text: The white-haired one is here too, meow!

20020222.Original_Text: 나도 반갑다냥!! 이렇게 만나다니 인연이다냥! \n어디서 밥이라도 같이 먹자냥!
20020222.English_Text: Long time no see, meow! It must be fate fur us to reunite like this! Let's go and have a yummy meal, purr!
20020222.Chinese_Text: 好久不见喵！！我们又见面了，真是有缘分喵！一起吃个饭吧喵！

20020223.English_Text: We can do that. By the way, do you know where <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</> is?
20020223.Chinese_Text: （比起那个问<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>噗隆噗隆</>在哪里）

20020224.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>님 말이다냥? \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</>님은 지금 다른 바롱들이랑 함께 약초를 찾으러 가셨다냥.
20020224.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</>, meow?
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</> went with the other Barons to look for herbs, purr.
20020224.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>噗隆噗隆</>大人喵？
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>噗隆噗隆</>大人跟其他巴隆们一起去采药草了喵。

20020226.Original_Text: 거긴 말이다냥, 여기서 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해가 비치는 쪽으로 쭈욱 가면 나오는 곳</>이다냥. \n바람의 손짓에 끌려가거나, 꽃향기를 따라가도 나온다냥.
20020226.English_Text:
You can get there by <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>following the sunlight</> from here, meow.
You can also try riding the wind, or following the smell of the flowers, mrrow.
20020226.Chinese_Text:
那个地方喵，朝着阳光照耀的方向一直走就能找到喵。
跟随风向或花香也能找到喵。

20020228.Original_Text: 어째서냥? 이보다 더 정확한 방법이 어디 있다고... \n아! 그럼 내가 이동시켜 주겠다냥!
20020228.English_Text:
Why, meow? What better way is there...?
Ah! I'll bring you there, purr!
20020228.Chinese_Text:
为什么喵？还有比这更准确的办法喵…
啊！那我帮你们移动吧喵！

20020229.English_Text: What? Th-that's not necessary! We can find the place ourselves!
20020229.Chinese_Text: 什么？不，不用！完全没关系！

20020230.Original_Text: 헤헤, 사양할 것 없다냥! 그럼 시작한다냥?!
20020230.English_Text: Hehe, don't worry, it isn't scawy, meow! Let's go!
20020230.Chinese_Text: 嘻嘻，不要客气喵！那么开始吧喵？！

20020233.Original_Text: (이런 위험한 곳에 왜 혼자 있냐고 묻는다)
20020233.English_Text: Why are you alone in such a dangerous place?
20020233.Chinese_Text: （问为什么一个人在这么危险的地方）

20020234.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>퍼롱퍼롱</> 할아버지랑 약초를 캐다가냥, \n길을 잃고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>뱀버섯</>들한테 쫓겨서 오가지도 못하고 이렇게 있었다냥.
20020234.English_Text:
I was gathering herbs with Grandpa <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Furlong</>,
but then I got lost and was chased by <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecaps</>. That's how I got twapped here, meow...
20020234.Chinese_Text:
我跟<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>噗隆噗隆</>爷爷一起采药草喵，
结果被蘑菇们追得无处可去喵。

20020236.Original_Text: 할아버지를냥? 할아버지는 지금 바롱들과 함께 약초를 캐고 계신다냥.
20020236.English_Text: Grandpa? Grandpa is harvesting herbs with the other Barons, mrrow.
20020236.Chinese_Text: 爷爷喵？爷爷跟其他巴隆一起在采药员休息处喵。

20020237.English_Text: Could you show me the way?

20020238.English_Text: Just leave it to me. I should pay you back fur defeating those <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Snakecaps</>, meow.
20020238.Chinese_Text: 交给我喵。你们帮我击退了蛇头菇，我帮你们带路喵。

20020240.Original_Text: 아가야! 그러잖아도 걱정하던 참이었다. \n어찌 된 일이더냐?
20020240.English_Text: Baby! I was so worried about you. What happened?
20020240.Chinese_Text: 我的孙儿！我好担心了你。到底发生了什么事？

20020242.English_Text: Thank you so much. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, I owe you.
20020242.Chinese_Text: 真是感激不尽…我们欠<textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>一笔人情。

20020243.Chinese_Text: （表示只是小事一桩，不要太在意）

20020244.Original_Text: 그럴 수야 없지 않겠나. 그러잖아도 여기, 이 소협에게 들었네. \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>에레다 문파 비밀 거점</>에 가려고 한다고?
20020244.English_Text:
I beg to differ. This warrior here said you were looking for 
the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Edeta's secret base</>. Is that right?
20020244.Chinese_Text: 不，这样可不行。我已经听你的伙伴说了。你们想去“<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派的<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>秘密据点</>”，对吗？

20020245.Chinese_Text: （表示没错，问有没有什么办法）

20020246.Original_Text: 쉽진 않겠지만 그곳에 있었던 물건이 있다면 그 기운을 따라 축지 길을 열어줄 수 있을 걸세.
20020246.English_Text: It won't be easy, but if you have something from that place, I can channel that energy and open a Windstride path.
20020246.Chinese_Text:
这个不太容易，不过如果有曾经在那个地方的物品，
就可以顺着那个气息打开遁地之路。

20020250.Original_Text: 이 녀석이랑 내가 줄곧 그곳에 잡혀 있다 왔거든.
20020250.English_Text: I was captured and held there with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></> for quite a while.
20020250.Chinese_Text: 这家伙和我之前一起被抓到了那个地方。

20020251.Original_Text: 허허, 그렇군. 물건이 아닌 살아있는 존재로는 해본적이 없지만... 어떻게든 해보겠네. \n단단히 준비해야 할 거야. 준비가 다 되면 말하게.
20020251.English_Text:
Hah hah. I see. I've never tried using a living thing for this purpose, but I'll manage.
You'd better brace yourself. Let me know when you're ready.
20020251.Chinese_Text:
呵呵，原来如此。我从没试过通过活着的个体使用遁地术…
不过不妨试一下。请做好准备之后告诉我一声。

20020252.Original_Text: 준비는 다 됐는가? 늙은이의 실력을 한번 펼쳐보겠네.
20020252.English_Text: Are you ready? Let me show you what I can do.
20020252.Chinese_Text: 做好了所有准备吗？让老头子大展身手吧。

20020253.English_Text: What's the worst that can happen? Let's go!
20020253.Chinese_Text: 反正也吃不了什么亏，试一下吧！

20020255.Original_Text: 자, 그럼 한번 가볼까? 퍼롱 퍼롱 퍼로로냐~앙!
20020255.English_Text: All right, then let's go! Furlong, Furlong, Furloooonggg-ong!

20020256.Original_Text: (다행이지만 다음에는 좀 더 안전하게 다니자고 말한다)
20020256.English_Text: It's a relief. I would prefer a safer method next time, though.
20020256.Chinese_Text: （表示虽然结果不错，不过下次可以试一下更安全的办法）

20020257.Original_Text: 그래, 그래. 알았다고. 다음부터는 확실한 방법으로 다닐게. \n그럼 이제 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>하름</>의 정체를 밝히면 되지? 들키지 않게 조심해!
20020257.English_Text:
All right, I get it. We'll try using a safer way next time.
So, now it's time to reveal <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</>'s identity, right? Be careful not to get caught!
20020257.Chinese_Text:
好，好，我知道啦，下次就用更好的办法。
接下来就要去揭开<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>霞凛</>的真面目吧？小心被发现！

20020258.English_Text: Where are you going? Why don't you come along?

20020259.Original_Text: 네가 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>의 재료를 찾아다닐 동안 내가 놀지 않았다는 증거를 가져오려고.
20020259.English_Text: I'm going to bring you proof that I wasn't just doing nothing while you were gathering the objects for the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>.
20020259.Chinese_Text: 我要带回在你搜集<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神祭礼</>材料时我没有偷懒的证据。

20020261.English_Text: You'll see what I mean. See you in a bit!
20020261.Chinese_Text: 你现在没必要知道。待会见！

20020262.Original_Text: 문주님!! 당신들 이게 대체 무슨 짓입니까!
20020262.English_Text: Ma'am!? What is the meaning of this!
20020262.Chinese_Text: 门主大人！！你们到底在做什么！

20020263.English_Text: Is this what you meant by her true identity!?
20020263.Chinese_Text: 这就是你们所说的真面目？！

20020264.English_Text: N-no, this isn't how it's supposed to be...

20020265.English_Text: Y-yes, if we pierce <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</> with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>True Sacrifice</>, she will reveal herself!
20020265.Chinese_Text: 对，对了！用真明刺<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>霞凛</>应该就能揭示真面目！

20020266.English_Text: What crazy nonsense are you spewing!?

20020267.Original_Text: 그래도 한때 문주로 모셨던 자입니다. \n마지막은 저희 손으로 처리할 수 있도록 허락해 주십시오.
20020267.English_Text:
Despite all this... she was once our leader.
Please let us take care of her last moments.
20020267.Chinese_Text:
好歹她也曾经是我们的门主。
最后就让我们亲手解决吧。

20020269.Chinese_Text: 大家都平安无事，真是太好了。旿凜大人呢？

20020271.English_Text: That's a relief. That means <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</> has...

20020272.English_Text: She has revealed herself. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Orum</> is taking care of her.
20020272.Chinese_Text: 她露出了真面目。<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>旿凜</>正在处理这件事。

20020275.Original_Text: 실은... 저희들은 이미 몇 해 전부터 이상한 낌새를 느끼고 있었습니다. \n허나 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>오름</>님께선 자신이 따르는 자에 있어 의심을 품는 건 옳지 않다고 하셔서...
20020275.English_Text:
Actually... We've noticed strange behavior going back a few years.
However, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Orum</> said it was not right to doubt our leader...
20020275.Chinese_Text:
其实…我们从几年之前就已经觉得有些蹊跷。
但是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>旿凜</>大人说不应该对自己追随的人怀有二心…

20020277.Chinese_Text: 多谢对我们最后的关照。

20020278.Original_Text: 뭘... 원래부터 이렇게 이야기 되었던 거잖아.
20020278.English_Text: Don't mention it... This was how it was meant to be.
20020278.Chinese_Text: 没什么…这都是我们之前就说好的。

20020280.Original_Text: 당연하지! 네가 재료를 찾아 다니는 동안 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>오름</>과 이번 일을 진행하느라 내가 얼마나 고생했는 줄 알아?
20020280.English_Text:
Of course! While you were gathering the materials,
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Orum</> and I worked ourselves to the bone to prepare this!
20020280.Chinese_Text:
当然！在你搜集材料的时候，
我与旿凜为了这个计划吃尽了苦头！

20020281.Original_Text: 아, 맞다! 그럼 이제 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>는 어떻게 되는 거야?
20020281.English_Text: Ah, right! So what about the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>?
20020281.Chinese_Text: 对了！现在<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神祭礼</>该怎么办？

20020282.Original_Text: 문주의 자리가 비었으니, 부문주인 제가 진행할 수 있습니다.
20020282.English_Text: Since the seat of the leader is vacant, I can conduct the ritual as the vice leader.
20020282.Chinese_Text: 既然门主之位出现空缺，可以由副门主的我来进行天神祭礼。

20020283.English_Text: That's a relief. Then, I'll leave it to you.

20020284.Original_Text: 두 분께선 저희 문파를 위해 큰 일을 해주셨습니다. 응당 은혜를 갚아야지요.  \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>를 올릴 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>경천단</>은 비원 뒷편에 있습니다.
20020284.English_Text:
You two have done a great deed for our clan. Naturally, we will repay you.
The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Celestial Altar</> where the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</> will be conducted is back there.
20020284.Chinese_Text:
两位为我们的门派付出了不少心血，我们理应报恩。
举行<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神祭礼</>的<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>敬天坛</>在秘苑后面。

20020285.English_Text: I will follow you shortly after getting the required materials.
20020285.Chinese_Text: 我们会在准备好必要的材料之后去秘苑。

20020286.English_Text: What the hell!? Parsha is just gone?

20020287.Original_Text: 이런... 노여움을 푸십시오. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>신수</>는 본디 인간계에 관여하지 않습니다. \n일개 인간의 물음에 대해 화를 내지 않은 것만도...
20020287.English_Text:
Oh, my. Please calm down. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Advocates</> do not normally meddle in the affairs of mortals.
You should be glad that they were not angered by a mere mortal questioning them...
20020287.Chinese_Text:
这…请不要生气。神兽从来不干预人界的事情。
对于普通人类的提问没有动怒就已经…

20020288.Original_Text: 일개 인간이라니! 이 녀석의 어머니와 관련된 일이라고!
20020288.English_Text: A mere mortal!? It's about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>'s mother!
20020288.Chinese_Text: 才不是普通人类！这可是与这家伙的母亲有关的事情！

20020291.English_Text: Sigh, we went through all that trouble...
20020291.Chinese_Text: 唉，我们吃尽了苦头，结果却…

20020292.Original_Text: 도움이 못 되어 드려 죄송합니다. 오늘 일은 안타까우나, 앞으로라도 저희 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파의 도움이 필요하게 되면 언제든 말씀 주십시오.
20020292.English_Text:
I apologize for not being able to help.
It is regrettable what happened today, but if you ever need the help of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</>, please call upon us again.
20020292.Chinese_Text: 这次没帮到什么忙，我感到十分抱歉。今天虽然多有遗憾，不过以后若需要我们<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派的帮助，请随时联系我们。

20020293.English_Text: ...There's nothing we can do about it. All right, then.

20020294.Chinese_Text: （虽然感觉很遗憾，但还是向<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>旿凜</>告别）

20020295.Original_Text: 그럼 다시 뵐 날을 기다리고 있겠습니다.
20020295.English_Text: Then, I will be looking forward to meeting you again.

20020298.Original_Text: 에이, 표정 풀어~ 분명 다른 방법이 있을거야.
20020298.English_Text: Hey, cheer up! I'm sure there's something else we can try.
20020298.Chinese_Text: 哎呀，不要露出这种表情~肯定有其他办法。

20020299.Chinese_Text: （听到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>饿狼</>的安慰后努力点点头）

20020300.Original_Text: 난 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>을 찾으러 가볼까 하는데.. 넌 어떡할래?
20020300.English_Text: I'm going to go in search of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>... What about you?

20020301.English_Text: I need some time to think.

20020302.Original_Text: 그래. 그것도 좋겠다. \n좀 쉬다 보면 좋은 생각이 떠오를거야. 그치?
20020302.English_Text: Yes, I think that's a good idea. I'm sure you'll figure something out after you take a break.
20020302.Chinese_Text: 好，那样也不错。休息之后一定会感觉好一点。对吧？

20020304.Original_Text: 오, 소협이시군요! 어쩐 일이시죠? \n아아, 준비하신다던 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>는 잘 지내셨나요?
20020304.English_Text:
Oh, it's you! What brings you here?
Ah, how did the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</> go?
20020304.Chinese_Text: 哟，原来是少侠！有什么事吗？对了，之前说要准备的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>天神祭礼</>呢？

20020306.Original_Text: 아... 그렇군요. 많이 기대하셨을텐데, 제가 다 아쉽네요.
20020306.English_Text: I see. You must've been looking forward to it. You must be very disappointed.
20020306.Chinese_Text: 啊…原来如此。我也知道少侠对此抱有很大的期待，连我都感觉很遗憾。

20020308.Original_Text: 그러실 수 있죠. <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</>에 넘어오셔서부터 쭉 달려오셨을테니까요. \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>안개 숲 개척지</>에서 남쪽으로 내려가면 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>참고요숲</>이 있습니다.
20020308.English_Text:
Of course. You haven't had any rest since you've come to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>.
There's the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Tranquil Woods</> south of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Foggy Forest Settlement</>.
20020308.Chinese_Text:
这也难怪，毕竟少侠来到<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海越大陆</>之后就一直在奔走。
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迷雾森林开拓地</>南边有一片<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>寂静森林</>。

20020309.Original_Text: 소협께서 조용히 머리를 식히실 수 있는 장소였으면 좋겠네요.
20020309.English_Text: I think it'd be a good place for you to relax.
20020309.Chinese_Text: 我觉得那里很适合少侠放松一下心情。

20020311.Original_Text: 아이고 덕분에 살았습니다. 아, 저는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원계곡</> 입구로 가고있었습니다. \n그곳 거점에 물건을 팔러 가고있었습니다.
20020311.English_Text:
You're my savior. I was headed to the entrance of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</>
since I had some commodities to sell at the base.
20020311.Chinese_Text:
哎哟，多谢救命之恩。啊，我要去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>乐猿溪谷</>入口，
打算在那里的据点卖点东西。

20020313.Original_Text: 이미 여기가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>참고요숲</>입니다. \n아! 좀 더 고요한 곳을 찾는 다면 이쪽으로 쭉 가시면 됩니다.
20020313.English_Text:
You're already in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Tranquil Woods</>.
Ah! If you're looking for a quieter place, you can find it that way, deeper in the woods.
20020313.Chinese_Text:
这里就是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>寂静森林</>。对了！
如果想找更寂静的地方，可以往这个方向继续走。

20020315.English_Text: No, I should be thanking you!
20020315.Chinese_Text: 不不，更应该感谢的是我！

20020316.Original_Text: 여기까지 올 수 있는 걸 보니, 그녀의 아이가 맞는가 보구나.
20020316.English_Text: Seeing that you came this far, you truly must be her child.
20020316.Chinese_Text: 竟然能来到这里，看来确实是她的孩子。

20020318.Original_Text: 이미 알겠지만, 네 어머니는 나와 같은 신수 중 하나였던 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노이</>였다. \n생명을 관장하고 세상을 사랑하던... 따스한 자였어.
20020318.English_Text:
As you might know already, your mother was <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noi</>, an Advocate like me.
She was a warm person who cared for all life and loved the world.
20020318.Chinese_Text:
你也知道你的母亲与我一样是神兽之一，叫<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>䛝怡</>。
她内心温暖，不仅掌管生命…还热爱这个世界。

20020319.Original_Text: 그런 그녀였기에 네 아비도 사랑할 수 있었던 거겠지.
20020319.English_Text: She must have been able to love your father because she was that kind of person.
20020319.Chinese_Text: 也许你的父亲也是因为这样爱上了她。

20020320.English_Text: Do you also know about my father?

20020321.Original_Text: 알다마다. 니 아비는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>였다. \n그리고... 네 어미를 죽였지.
20020321.English_Text: Of course. Your father was a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>. And... he killed your mother.
20020321.Chinese_Text: 当然知道。你的父亲是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>修罗</>，而且…他害死了你的母亲。

20020323.Original_Text: 듣지 않아도 상관없다. 어차피 보게 될 테니.
20020323.English_Text: It doesn't matter if you don't believe it now. You will eventually see it for yourself.
20020323.Chinese_Text: 不愿意听也没有关系。你总有一天会亲眼看到。

20020324.Original_Text: 애당초 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>와 같이 부정한 자를 곁에 두는 것이 아니었다. \n그러나 그녀는 세상의 모든 걸 포용했지. 그리고 그게 이 결과를 가져왔다.
20020324.English_Text:
We shouldn't have kept a corrupt being the likes of a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> by our sides.
But your mother... she embraced everything in the world. And that has led to this.
20020324.Chinese_Text:
她从一开始就不该接近像修罗那样的邪恶存在。
但她包容了这个世界的一切，最终迎来了那种结局。

20020326.Original_Text: 네 모습을 보거라. 너도 이미 알고 있지 않느냐.
20020326.English_Text: Look at yourself. Don't you already know the answer?
20020326.Chinese_Text: 看看你自己。我想你自己也早就知道了。

20020327.English_Text: Is there any proof that he's my father?
20020327.Chinese_Text: （但是…问是否自己的父亲真的是修罗）

20020328.Original_Text: 어미의 기억에서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>붉은 옥</>을 보았느냐? \n그건 네 아비가 항상 차고 다니던 것이다.
20020328.English_Text:
Have you seen the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Red Orb</> in your mother's memories?
That was something your father always wore.
20020328.Chinese_Text: 你在母亲的记忆中看到了红玉吧？那是你的父亲随身携带的物品。

20020329.Original_Text: 그 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>홍옥</>이 떨어져 있었던 것, 그리고 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>의 존재... \n네 어미는 네 아비가 죽인 것이야!
20020329.English_Text:
The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Red Orb</> fallen on the ground, and the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>'s existence...
There's no doubt that your father is the culprit who killed your mother!
20020329.Chinese_Text: 掉落的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>红玉</>，还有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>修罗</>的存在…也就是说你的父亲害死了你的母亲！

20020332.Original_Text: 그러니까 네 말은... 네가 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>와 신수 사이에서 태어난 아이라는 거지? \n그리고 네 어머니를 죽인 사람... 아니 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>는 네 아버지고?
20020332.English_Text:
So you're saying that... you're a child born from an Advocate and a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>?
And the person... I mean, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> who killed your mother was your father?
20020332.Chinese_Text:
也就是说…你是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>修罗</>与神兽生下的孩子？
而且杀死你母亲的人…不，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>修罗</>是你的父亲？

20020333.English_Text: Hmm... Are you certain about that?
20020333.Chinese_Text: 唔…不过你确定是这样吗？

20020334.English_Text: What do you mean by that?

20020335.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노이</>의 기억 속에서 아버지의 모습을 봤을 거 아냐. \n같은 사람이 맞아?
20020335.English_Text: You must've seen your father in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Noi</>'s memory. Was it the same person?
20020335.Chinese_Text: 你在<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>䛝怡</>的记忆中看过父亲的样子吧。确定是相同的人吗？

20020336.Chinese_Text: （表示没有看清楚<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>修罗</>的样子）

20020337.English_Text: Then, you can't be absolutely sure! Right?
20020337.Chinese_Text: 也就是说你还不能确定！对吧？

20020339.Original_Text: 그렇고 말고! 그러니까 이렇게 풀 죽어 있을 게 아니라 직접 확인해 보자. \n네 아버지가 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>가 맞다면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>를 불러서 물어보면 되잖아.
20020339.English_Text:
Of course, it is! Don't be so upset. Let's go and figure this out for ourselves.
If your father is a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>, we can call a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> to verify that.
20020339.Chinese_Text:
当然！所以不要这么垂头丧气，我们来确认一下吧。
如果你的父亲确实是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>修罗</>，只要把<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>修罗</>召唤出来问一下不就可以了吗？

20020341.English_Text: Do you remember the Martial Arts Championship? You opened a Fissure back then.
20020341.Chinese_Text: 你还记得武术大会吗？当时你打开了裂缝。

20020342.English_Text: Are you planning to open a Fissure and call a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</>?
20020342.Chinese_Text: （问是不是想打开裂缝后召唤<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>修罗</>）

20020343.Original_Text: 맞아! 그때처럼 균열을 열면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수라</>를 불러올 수 있지 않을까? \n어디보자... 그래 저기, 저기가 좋겠다.
20020343.English_Text:
That's right! Won't we be able to call a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Sura</> if we open up a Fissure like we did then?
Let's see... Yes, that place should do.
20020343.Chinese_Text:
没错！如果能像当时一样打开裂缝，应该可以召唤出<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>修罗</>吧？
让我想想…就选在那里吧。

20020344.Original_Text: 자, 이제 우리 둘이 싸우면 균열이 열리려나?
20020344.English_Text: Now, will a Fissure open if we fight?

20020345.English_Text: We fought at the Martial Arts Championship.
20020345.Chinese_Text: （说武术大会时两个人战斗的事情）

20020346.Original_Text: 그렇게 하면 되겠지? \n그럼~ 오랜만에 한 수 부탁해!
20020346.English_Text: That should work, right? Well then, I'm counting on you!
20020346.Chinese_Text: 难道需要我们在这里战斗？要不要来试一下？

20020347.English_Text: It doesn't seem to be working, does it?

20020348.Original_Text: 이상하다... 왜 안되는 거지? 그때랑 장소가 달라서 그런가? \n아 그래! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>이 없어서 그런가보다!
20020348.English_Text:
That's weird. Why isn't it working? Perhaps it's because it's a different location...?
Ah, right! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>! It must because there's no <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</> here!
20020348.Chinese_Text:
真奇怪…为什么没有效果？难道是因为场所不同？
对了！<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>閟玉</>！看来是因为没<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>有閟玉</>！

20020349.English_Text: It's not just a matter of the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>.

20020350.English_Text: That's right. It's because of the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>. Then, we just need to obtain <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>, right?
20020350.Chinese_Text: 原来如此。原来是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>閟玉</>的问题。那么只要找到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>閟玉</>就行吧？

20020352.Original_Text: 무슨 소리야~ 날 앞에 두고 그런 말을 해?
20020352.English_Text: What are you talking about? If we're not talking about an Advocate's <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>... Don't forget who you're talking to.
20020352.Chinese_Text: 你在说什么？又不是神兽的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>閟玉</>...你在我面前竟然还说那种话？

20020355.English_Text: Welcome, sir. It's been a while.
20020355.Chinese_Text: 欢迎门主大人。好久不见。

20020356.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>비류하</> 사형! 아니 이제 장로님이라고 불러야 하나?
20020356.English_Text: Brother <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</>! Or should I call you Elder now?
20020356.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>沸流河</>师兄！不对，该叫你长老了吧？

20020357.Original_Text: 장로가 된지도 벌써 반년이 지났습니다. \n도대체 언제까지 문파를 버려두실 생각이십니까.
20020357.English_Text:
It's already been half a year since I've become an Elder.
How long are you planning to stay away from the clan, anyway?
20020357.Chinese_Text:
我早在半年之前就已经是长老了。
门主大人到底想对门派撒手不管到什么时候？

20020358.Original_Text: 버려둔 거라니! 식견을 넓히기 위해 세상도 유랑하고! \n음... 또 뭘 했더라...?
20020358.English_Text: I also have something to point out. There's an old man who won't return my sword...
20020358.Chinese_Text: 我也有一肚子话想说。那个老头子还没有把剑还给我。

20020360.Chinese_Text: 啊哈哈哈，知道了，知道了。

20020361.English_Text: And this person next to you is...?

20020362.Chinese_Text: 哦，打个招呼吧。这是我的朋友。

20020363.Original_Text: 친구!? 친구요??? 이렇게나 반가울데가!!!! \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>님께 드디어 정상적인 친구가 생기다니...
20020363.English_Text:
Friend? A friend? What a pleasure!
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Master Aran</> finally has a normal friend.
20020363.Chinese_Text:
朋友？！朋友？？？真是天大的好消息！！！！
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>饿狼</>大人终于交了个正常的朋友…

20020365.English_Text: Well, you could say that there's been some trouble.
20020365.Chinese_Text: 那个…其实发生了一点事。稍微…

20020367.Original_Text: 그게... 제가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 거점책임자와 약조한 게 하나 있습니다. \n나중을 위해 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>에게 빚을 지워놓는 셈이죠.
20020367.English_Text:
Uh... I made a promise with the Base Supervisor of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
I only did it so they'd owe me later.
20020367.Chinese_Text:
那个…我和<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>据点负责人约定了一件事。
为了以后，欠了<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>搜阳</>一笔人情债。

20020368.Original_Text: 역시 사형은 무서운 사람이야. 그래서 무슨 약조인데?
20020368.English_Text: Brother, you really are cunning. So, what was the promise?
20020368.Chinese_Text: 果然师兄是个很可怕的人。约定的内容是什么？

20020369.English_Text: I promised them that I'd eliminate the Nepenthes from the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Nepenthes Marsh</>.
20020369.Chinese_Text: 我承诺会消灭<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>啖人草湿地</>的啖人草。

20020370.Original_Text: 난 또... 뭐야, 간단한 일이잖아. \n그 이야기를 하려고 장소까지 옮긴 거야?
20020370.English_Text: That's simpler than I thought. Is that really all you want to say, though?
20020370.Chinese_Text: 我还以为…这不是很简单吗？师兄拉我到一边就是为了说这件事？

20020371.Original_Text: 매번 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>님의 경향을 보자면, 이번에도 문파에 무언가를 구하러 가시는 것일 터...
20020371.English_Text: From what I know of you, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>, there's something you need from the clan if you're here now.
20020371.Chinese_Text: 以<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>饿狼</>大人的作风来看，这次应该也是到门派取什么东西…

20020373.Original_Text: 그렇군요. 그렇다면... 그 전에 문주로서 하실 도리는 하셔야 겠지요?
20020373.English_Text: I see. Then, I suggest you fulfill your duties as a leader before that.
20020373.Chinese_Text: 原来如此。那么…大人应该尽一下作为门主的义务吧？

20020374.Original_Text: 으으. 뭐지 이 웃으면서 협박하는 느낌은? \n알았어... 다녀 올게.
20020374.English_Text: Ugh. You're smiling while you're intimidating me into doing this? Fine, okay, I'll do it.
20020374.Chinese_Text: 唔…这种笑着威胁别人的感觉真是…知道了…交给我吧。

20020376.Original_Text: 이미 들으셨겠지만 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>담인초</>가 겉잡을 수 없이 늘어나 \n통행로를 안전하게 이용하는 것 조차 힘든 지경입니다.
20020376.English_Text: As you've heard, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</> have multiplied out of control and it's difficult to use the path safely.
20020376.Chinese_Text: 我想两位已经听说了，这里的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>啖人草</>数量剧增，到了难以保证道路安全的地步。

20020377.English_Text: How are they multiplying so fast?
20020377.Chinese_Text: 啖人草的数量为何会突然剧增？

20020378.Original_Text: 기후 조건이 딱 들어맞은 것으로 추측 중입니다만,\n아무것도 확신할 수는 없습니다.
20020378.English_Text:
We're suspecting the weather conditions were just right,
but we're really not sure.
20020378.Chinese_Text:
我们推测应该是适宜的气候条件所致，
但还无法确定。

20020379.Original_Text: 상부에서는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>담인초</>를 조사하는 일에 인력을 쓸 수 없다는 입장이라... \n손이 모자란 상태입니다.
20020379.English_Text:
The higher-ups made it clear that they don't want to spare any manpower to investigate the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</>.
That's why we don't have enough people to handle this.
20020379.Chinese_Text:
上头说没有人力可以派来调查<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>啖人草</>…
因此我们现在人手不足。

20020380.English_Text: Then, should I help with the investigation?

20020381.Original_Text: 오, 여력이 되신다면 표본을 좀 구해주시면 감사하겠습니다.
20020381.English_Text: We'd be entirely grateful if you could collect some samples.
20020381.Chinese_Text: 是。如果方便的话，请你带回一些标本。

20020382.English_Text: The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</> should be a breeze. Right?

20020383.English_Text: You shouldn't let down your guard.

20020384.English_Text: Then, I'll leave it to you.

20020386.Original_Text: 감사합니다! 이걸로 상황이 조금은 일단락 되면 좋겠습니다.
20020386.English_Text: Thank you! I hope this solves the situation.
20020386.Chinese_Text: 非常感谢！希望这样能够使事情告一段落。

20020388.Original_Text: 자아~ 그럼 시킨 일도 다 끝냈고... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>으로 돌아가볼까?
20020388.English_Text: Now that the job's done, shall we go back to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>?
20020388.Chinese_Text: 好~任务也完成了…要不要回<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>看看？

20020389.Original_Text: 그게요, 문주님. 지금 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>로 넘어가는 길이 막혔다고 합니다.
20020389.English_Text: Actually, it looks like the path to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Lands</> is blocked right now.
20020389.Chinese_Text: 那个，门主大人，听说现在去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>閟玉大地</>的路被封堵了。

20020391.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 비탈</>로 넘어가는 길목에 식인 식물이 자라나 벽을 이뤘다고 합니다. \n하하, 문주님이 오시니 별 일이 다 생기네요.
20020391.English_Text:
A wall of carnivorous plants has grown on the path to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</>.
Hah, we've been having all these problems since your return.
20020391.Chinese_Text:
前往<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>红色山坡</>的路口上长出的食人植物，形成了一道墙。
哈哈，门主大人一回来就发生了奇怪的事呢。

20020392.Original_Text: 그게 나랑 무슨 상관인데! 하... 이를 어쩐다.
20020392.English_Text: What does that have to do with me!? Sigh, what should I do?
20020392.Chinese_Text: 这跟我有什么关系！唉…这该怎么办。

20020393.English_Text: We should find out the source of the problem.
20020393.Chinese_Text: （表示应该去了解一下问题所在）

20020394.Original_Text: 그럼 문제가 해결된 후에 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 비탈</>에서 뵙기로 하죠. \n저도 일단 개인적인 용무 좀 보고 오겠습니다.
20020394.English_Text:
Then, we'll meet at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</> when the problem has been resolved.
Before then, I've got other business to attend to.
20020394.Chinese_Text:
那么解决问题之后在<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>红色山坡</>汇合吧。
我也要去处理一下个人事务。

20020395.English_Text: Okay. I'll meet you at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</> later.

20020396.Original_Text: 감사합니다! 이걸로 상황이 조금은 일단락 되면 좋겠습니다.
20020396.English_Text: Thank you! I hope this solves the situation.
20020396.Chinese_Text: 非常感谢！希望这样能够使事情告一段落。

20020398.Original_Text: 자아~ 그럼 시킨 일도 다 끝냈고... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>으로 돌아가볼까?
20020398.English_Text: Now that the job's done, shall we go back to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>?
20020398.Chinese_Text: 好~任务也完成了…要不要回<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>看看？

20020399.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>낙원 계곡</>에도 무언가 일이 벌어지고 있는 모양입니다. \n관심이 있으시면 그곳에 다녀오시는 것도 나쁘지 않을 것 같습니다.
20020399.English_Text:
There seems to be something happening at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Simyu Valley</>.
If you're interested, it might not be a bad idea to go take a look there.

20020400.English_Text: Did you promise to do something for somebody again?

20020401.English_Text: You came! Are you sure you're ready?
20020401.Chinese_Text: 哈哈。你来得最晚，确定做好了准备吗？

20020403.Original_Text: 그럼 출발하겠습니다! 자~ 선원들 각자 위치로!
20020403.English_Text: Then, we'll get going! Crew, to your stations!
20020403.Chinese_Text: 那么出发了！好~船员们各就各位！

20020404.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, is this your first time in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>?

20020405.Original_Text: 좋았어. 그럼 여긴 나에게 맡겨. 어디... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파부터 찾아가 볼까나?
20020405.English_Text: Great. Then, leave it to me. Let's see, how about we go to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> Clan first?
20020405.Chinese_Text: 很好。从这里开始交给我吧。那个…先去找<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派吧？

20020407.Original_Text: 하여간... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>비류하</> 사형은 예나 지금이나 똑같네. \n장로가 됐다고 해서 달라진 건 없네~
20020407.English_Text: Brother <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</> is the same as always. He hasn't changed at all after becoming an Elder.
20020407.Chinese_Text: 真是…<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>沸流河</>师兄还是依然如故。成为长老之后还是一点没变~

20020409.Original_Text: 그런가~? 하긴 나도 변한게 없네. 하하.
20020409.English_Text: Is it? Come to think of it, I haven't changed, either. Haha.
20020409.Chinese_Text: 是吗~？话说我也没有什么改变，哈哈。

20020410.English_Text: Tell me more about what's happened.

20020411.Original_Text: 아, 내가 이야기 안했었지? 하하... 보다시피 난 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>의 문주야. \n난 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>시로</>의 회귀자이고, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>시로</>가 시초니까.. 당연히 알 줄 알았지...
20020411.English_Text: Ah, haven't I told you? Well, I'm the leader of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>. It's because I'm <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shiro</>'s Reborn, and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Shiro</> is the founder of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>. I thought you already knew that.
20020411.Chinese_Text: 啊，我还没说过吗？哈哈…如你所见，我是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>的门主，也是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>始路</>的轮回者，<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>始路</>是<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>的创始人…所以我以为你早就知道了…

20020413.English_Text: I'm sorry. Then, let's catch up to Brother <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</>.
20020413.Chinese_Text: 哈哈，抱歉。我们去追<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>沸流河</>师兄吧？

20020414.Original_Text: (알 수 없는 기운이 흘러나오지만 왠지 모르게 친숙하게 느껴진다)
20020414.English_Text: (A mysterious energy exudes, but it feels familiar somehow.)
20020414.Chinese_Text: （虽然流露出奇异气息，但感觉莫名地亲近）

20020415.English_Text: Shall we go and get some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</>?

20020416.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비옥</>은 쉽게 구할 수 있는 물건이 아니라고 한다)
20020416.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Caelite</> isn't easy to get a hold of.
20020416.Chinese_Text: （说<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>閟玉</>并不是容易获得的东西）

20020417.Chinese_Text: 怎么可能…竟然会这么强。

20020418.Original_Text: 너희들은 뭐야!? 그 옷을 보니... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>에레다 문파원</>들인가? \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다</> 문파가 왜 우리를 공격하는 거야?
20020418.English_Text:
Who are you? Judging by your outfit... could you be in the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Edeta Clan</>?
Why are the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> attacking us?
20020418.Chinese_Text: 你们是什么人？！你们的衣服…难道是<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>艾瑞达</>门派成员？<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>艾瑞达</>门派为什么要攻击我们？

20020419.Original_Text: 그걸 몰라서 묻나? \n너희들이 우리 문주님을 공격해서 해를 입혔지 않느냐!
20020419.English_Text: Is this a joke? Aren't you the ones who attacked and injured our leader first!?
20020419.Chinese_Text: 你还问？还不是因为你们攻击我们的门主大人！

20020420.English_Text: What? Are you talking about me dueling with <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Harum</>?
20020420.Chinese_Text: 什么？！你是说与<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>霞凛</>战斗的事情？

20020421.English_Text: Do you confess that you attacked our leader?
20020421.Chinese_Text: 你承认攻击了门主大人？

20020422.English_Text: But she's not your leader. She's a monster!
20020422.Chinese_Text: 但那家伙不是门主，而是怪物！

20020423.Original_Text: 닥쳐라! 더 이상 문주님을 모욕하면 가만 두지 않겠다!
20020423.English_Text: Shut up! I will not forgive you if you insult our leader any further!
20020423.Chinese_Text: 闭嘴！不许继续侮辱门主大人！

20020425.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>파사</>가 말한 곳이 여기인 것 같다. 들어가보자)
20020425.English_Text: (This seems to be the place <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Parsha</> mentioned. Let's go in.)
20020425.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>破邪</>说的地方应该就是这里，进去看看吧）

20020426.English_Text: Will you come back to your senses if we bring <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Horyong</>?
20020426.Chinese_Text: 难道要我请来<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>浩龙</>大人，你才会让步？！

20020427.English_Text: Master <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Moonwind</> is just as formidable! How dare you try to bring shame to Horyong's name!?
20020427.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>月光疾风</>大人也不是好惹的！别想拿郭浩龙压我！

20020428.English_Text: I'm the first to find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>.

20020429.English_Text: But it was me who chased away the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>spiders</>!

20020430.Original_Text: 그러지 말고 딱 반만 주시면 안 될까요?\n아, 누님. 저희가 하루 이틀 본 사이도 아니고...
20020430.English_Text:
Could you please give me half?
Ah, and please consider how long we've known each other.
20020430.Chinese_Text:
可不可以给一半呢？
哎呀，大姐。看在我们过去的交情上...

20020431.Original_Text: 아 글쎄, 동생 사정이 딱한 건 나도 알겠는데, 나도 힘들게 구한 거라니까 그러네. \n언제 내가 동생 힘들 때 안 챙겨줬어?
20020431.English_Text:
Like I said, I understand you need help, but it wasn't easy for me to get this, either.
Come on, when have I not done my best to help you?
20020431.Chinese_Text: 唔，我也明白老弟的情况很困难，但我也是好不容易才得到了这么一点。平常我没照顾你吗？

20020432.Original_Text: 암요암요. 챙겨 주셨지요. \n그러니까 이번에도 조금만... 반이 힘들면 반의 반이라도 좀...
20020432.English_Text: Of course, of course. I know you're always helping me. That's why I'm asking you to help me one more time. If half is too hard, then maybe just a quarter...
20020432.Chinese_Text: 当然当然，大姐一直很照顾我。所以这次也稍微...如果不能给一半的话，四分之一呢...

20020433.Original_Text: 어허이. 이 사람이! 자꾸 이러면 서로 불편해지는 거야. \n내가 다음에 여력이 될 때 도와주면 될 거 아니야.
20020433.English_Text:
Stop it, you! This will just make us both feel uncomfortable.
I said I'll help you next time if I can.
20020433.Chinese_Text: 哎哟，有完没完！你继续说下去只会相互难受。等我有余力时一定帮你。

20020434.English_Text: If you say so. All right.
20020434.Chinese_Text: 既然大姐这么说...我明白了。

20020437.English_Text: Mister! You said you needed <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>, right?

20020438.Original_Text: 불난 집에 부채질하려고 왔어? 들었으면 알 거 아니야.
20020438.English_Text: Have you come to fuel the fire? You'd understand since you've heard already.
20020438.Chinese_Text: 你这是落井下石？你刚才不是听到了吗？

20020439.English_Text: I've come to put out the fire. Here, it's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider web</>.
20020439.Chinese_Text: 我们想来帮你。给你蜘蛛丝。

20020441.Original_Text: 근데 공짜로는 안 되죠. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>에레다 문파</>를 찾고 있어요.
20020441.English_Text: But there's something I want to know. I'm looking for the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta Clan</>.
20020441.Chinese_Text: 不过当然不是免费。我们正在寻找艾瑞达门派。

20020442.Original_Text: 으음... 좋다. 알려주마. 대신! 위험해도 난 모른다?
20020442.English_Text: All right, I'll tell you. But don't hold me responsible. You could find yourself in a lot of danger.
20020442.Chinese_Text: 唔...好吧。我告诉你们。不过！你们遇到危险可不能怪我？
