20020443.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>동부 생태 조사림</>으로 가보면 만날 수도 있을 게다. \n가끔 그곳에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>에레다 문파원</>들이 나타난다는 이야기를 들은 적이 있어.
20020443.English_Text:
You might cross paths if you go to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>East Ecological Research Site</>.
I heard that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Edeta recruits</> are seen there from time to time.
20020443.Chinese_Text: 去东部生态调查林吧。我听说艾瑞达门派成员偶尔会出现在那里。

20020444.English_Text: The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>East Ecological Research Site</>... Ah, you brought some <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>spider webs</>. Thank you, sir!
20020444.Chinese_Text: 东部生态调查林吗...啊，给你蜘蛛丝。谢谢大叔！

20020445.English_Text: (There are clues that people have been here.)

20020446.Original_Text: 또 보네, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>. <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>천신제례</>를 준비하고 있다는 소문은 들었어.
20020446.English_Text: Hello again, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>. I heard that you were preparing the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Heavenly Ritual</>.
20020446.Chinese_Text: 又见面了，<myHero.name/>。我听说你们在准备天神祭礼。

20020447.English_Text: Oh wow. How did you know?
20020447.Chinese_Text: （对于他已经知道这件事表示很吃惊）

20020448.Original_Text: 다 방법이 있지. 그렇다면 우리 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금경철검</>을 빌려줘야겠네? 뭐 못 빌려줄 것도 없지. 대신 조건이 있어.
20020448.English_Text:
I have my ways. I suppose that means the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Soul Steel</> needs to lend you the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul Steel Blade</>?
Well, that won't be difficult, but I have a condition.
20020448.Chinese_Text: 我们自有办法。那么，你们需要借我们金庚哲门的金庚哲剑吧？借你们也无妨。不过有条件。

20020450.Original_Text: 지금 우리는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>환영혼불</>로 강철을 제련하는 법에 대해 연구하고 있어. \n연구에 필요한 재료를 구해줘.
20020450.English_Text:
We're currently researching to find a method to refine steel with the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Illusion Soulfire</>.
I want you to collect what we need for that research.
20020450.Chinese_Text: 我们正在研究利用幻影魂火提炼钢铁的方法。找来一些研究所需的材料吧。

20020452.Original_Text: 자, 이 정도면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>환영혼불</>은 충분하고... <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>환영혼불</>을 정제할 때 쓸 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>식물의 진액</>이 필요해. 마침 주변에 투연초도 많네. 그럼 부탁해.
20020452.English_Text:
That should be enough <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Illusion Soulfire</>. Now we need that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>plant sap</> to refine it.
Fortunately, we have plenty of Spitting Plants in the area. I'll leave that to you.
20020452.Chinese_Text: 好，现在有了足够的幻影魂火...还需要提炼幻影魂火所需的植物黏液。附近有很多透烟草。那么拜托了。

20020453.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>투연초의 진액</> 말고도 더 필요한 게 있냐고 묻는다)
20020453.English_Text: Do you need anything other than <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Spitting Plant's Sap</>?
20020453.Chinese_Text: （问除了透烟草的黏液还需要什么）

20020454.Original_Text: 음... 아직까지는...? \n연구가 진행되는 상황에 따라 한두 가지 더 부탁할 수도 있으니 그렇게 알아둬.
20020454.English_Text: I can't really think of anything right now. But keep in mind that I may ask for one or two more things as our research progresses.
20020454.Chinese_Text: 唔...暂时没有吧...？随着研究进度，我们可能还会要求你们去搜集一两种材料，就这样吧。

20020455.English_Text: Thanks. You've gathered everything I asked for.
20020455.Chinese_Text: 谢谢。你们做得比想象中更好呢。

20020456.English_Text: Can I borrow the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul Steel Blade</> now?
20020456.Chinese_Text: （问现在是否可以借金庚哲剑）

20020457.Original_Text: 그럼 물론. 네가 물건을 구하는 사이, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>강철주먹</>이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</>에 다녀왔어.
20020457.English_Text: Of course. While you were gone, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Steel Fist</> came by at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port</>.
20020457.Chinese_Text: 当然。在你们搜集材料的时候，铁拳去了趟誉导港。

20020458.English_Text: Here it is, the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul Steel Blade</>.

20020460.Original_Text: 흠집 하나 없이 돌려줘야 해. 그럼 무운을 빌어.
20020460.English_Text: You'd better return it unscathed. Well, I wish you the best of luck.
20020460.Chinese_Text: 归还宝剑时不能有任何破损。那么祝你们武运昌盛。

20020461.Original_Text: 하하, 그런 것은 아닙니다. 그저 권유일 뿐입니다. \n저도 일단 개인적인 용무 좀 보고 오겠습니다.
20020461.English_Text:
Haha, it's nothing like that. It's just a simple offer.
Before then, I've got other business to attend to.
20020461.Chinese_Text: 哈哈，并非如此。只是一点建议而已。我也要去处理一下个人事物。

20020462.English_Text: I'll consider it, since it's <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</>!
20020462.Chinese_Text: 唔...既然是沸流河师兄的话，我一定会考虑！

20020463.Original_Text: 말이라도 그렇게 해주시니 고맙네요. 하하. \n일이 정리되면 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 비탈</>에서 기다리고 있겠습니다. 그럼 이만.
20020463.English_Text:
Thank you for saying that. Haha.
I'll be waiting for you at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Slope</> when everything's settled. Well then, I'll see you later.
20020463.Chinese_Text: 谢谢你这么说，哈哈。事情结束之后，我会在红色山坡等着你们。再见。

20020465.Original_Text: (조, 조금은 시끄러운 것 같지만 이곳이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>참고요 숲</>인 것 같다)
20020465.English_Text: (Although it seems a bit noisy for its namesake... this seems to be the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Tranquil Woods</>.
20020465.Chinese_Text: (乔，好像有点吵，不过这个地方好像是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>注：森林</>)
